summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Law Office website. Fixed critical frontend compilation errors (smart quotes in text). Backend APIs fully functional. Frontend navigation, forms, and responsive design working correctly. SEO meta tags and JSON-LD schema markup not rendering (react-helmet-async issue).

seo_issues.issue: SEO meta tags (title, description, canonical, Open Graph) and JSON-LD schema markup not rendering in HTML. Helmet components are defined but not updating the DOM.
seo_issues.impact: CRITICAL - Search engines will see default 'Emergent | Fullstack App' title instead of law office content. This severely impacts SEO and social media sharing.
affected_elements: Page title (showing 'Emergent | Fullstack App' instead of law office titles)
Meta description (showing 'A product of emergent.sh' instead of law office descriptions)
Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:url - all missing)
JSON-LD schema markup (Attorney, LocalBusiness, LegalService, FAQ, Breadcrumb schemas not rendering)
seo_issues.root_cause: react-helmet-async not updating meta tags in client-side rendered app. The Helmet components are properly defined in code but not being applied to the DOM.

passed_tests: Backend API health check - database connection verified
Backend contact form submission with valid data
Backend contact form validation with invalid data
Backend get submissions endpoint with authentication
Backend get submissions endpoint without token (correctly denied)
Frontend page load (Home, Unemployment Appeals, Other Areas)
Phone call CTAs with tel: links on all pages
Contact form submission and validation on Home page
Contact form clears after successful submission
Header sticky behavior and logo display
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes

success_percentage.frontend_seo: 0% (meta tags and schema markup not rendering)

critical.issue: SEO Meta Tags and JSON-LD Schema Not Rendering
critical.description: All Helmet components are defined in the code but react-helmet-async is not updating the DOM meta tags. Page title shows 'Emergent | Fullstack App' instead of law office content. All Open Graph tags and JSON-LD schemas are missing from rendered HTML.
critical.suggested_fix: 1. Verify HelmetProvider is correctly wrapping the app. 2. Check if Helmet components need to be moved outside of conditional rendering. 3. Consider using react-helmet instead of react-helmet-async if SSR is not needed. 4. Ensure Helmet components are rendering before page load completes. 5. May need to update index.html to remove default meta tags that might be conflicting.

minor.description: Found and fixed smart quotes (curly apostrophes) in HomePage.jsx and OtherAreasPage.jsx that were causing compilation errors. Changed contractions like 'you'll' to 'you will' to avoid future issues.
